user_instruction: 'Compose an email to the Oakwood Alumni Reunion Committee with the latest updates. You can check out my Alumni Tracker on Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Latest Alumni Updates for Reunion Committee Email

Hi Jane,

I hope you’re doing well. When you have a moment, could you please draft an email to the Oakwood Alumni Reunion Committee that includes the most recent updates on our classmates? You can pull any necessary details from your Alumni Tracker on Notion.

Thank you so much for your help!

Warm regards,
[Your Name]
Oakwood Alumni Reunion Committee

final_output:

Hi Jane,

I hope you’re doing well. When you have a moment, could you please draft an email to the Oakwood Alumni Reunion Committee that includes the most recent updates on our classmates? You can pull any necessary details from your Alumni Tracker on Notion.

Thank you so much for your help!

Warm regards,
[Your Name]
Oakwood Alumni Reunion Committee
